title: Watch Face Nixie Tubes
summary: Steampunk Nixie Tubes Watch Face for Android Wear clock
description: Pimp your watch with Steampunk Nixie Tubes Watch Face. Clean and fast digital interface for everyday use.FEATURES:- 12/24 auto-format- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches SupportINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose Nixie Tubes Watch Face4. Enjoy!The Nixie Tubes watchface has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
descriptionHTML:
Pimp your watch with Steampunk Nixie Tubes Watch Face. Clean and fast digital interface for everyday use.

FEATURES:

- 12/24 auto-format
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Nixie Tubes Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The Nixie Tubes watchface has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
comments: Nice design For those of us without amoled displayed, any chance you could re-add the option for the full watch face in ambient mode?

Basic but works and looks great on my round faced watch; however, on my square faced watch, it looks offset and the first and last digits are smaller. It wasn't like that before but a couple months ago it changed and hasn't been fixed, yet.
Great looking. One of the nicest nixie tube faces out there.
Only displays 24 hour format. Ambient mode not an option. No seconds.
Does not work!!!!!  S6 with moto 360!! Followed instructions waited multiple minutes.  Closed and restarted everything and nothing showed up.  Probably a scam.
recentChanges: + Added manual settings for time (12/24) formats
+ Some fixes for Moto 360 (2nd Generation) and Huawei Watch
Please, don't forget to Rate It ★★★★★
